Class DatabaseController

extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods to interact with the database

    • Method Detail

      • selectAllRows

        public static javax.sql.rowset.CachedRowSet selectAllRows()
                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is used to get all the ingredients stored in the pantry
        Returns:
        A CachedRowSet containing the ingredients in the pantry, each ingredient having in this order a field apiID, a field foodName, a field expirationDate and a field quantity
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • deleteSelectedRow

        public static void deleteSelectedRow​(java.lang.String apiID)
        Delete a certain ingredient from pantry.db
        Parameters:
        apiID - a string that is obtained when selecting a row in the pantry view

      • addItemInTable

        public static void addItemInTable​(java.lang.String string,
                                  java.lang.String foodName,
                                  java.lang.String expirationdate,
                                  java.lang.String quantity)
        Method used to store ingredient one at a time in the table Pantry in the database
        Parameters:
        string - The apiID, obtained with a edamam api search
        foodName - The name of the selected food
        expirationdate - The expiration date selected in the calendar
        quantity - The quantity to add in the pantry, with it's unit

      • updateItemInTable

        public static void updateItemInTable​(java.lang.String apiID,
                                     java.lang.String quantity,
                                     java.lang.String expirationdate)
        Updates the Pantry table if the user wants to insert an ingredient already existing in the pantry
        Parameters:
        apiID - The apiID given by edamam api
        quantity - The quantity the user wants to insert in the pantry
        expirationdate - The expiration date, which will be used to update the current expiration date

      • checkIfItemExists

        public static javax.sql.rowset.CachedRowSet checkIfItemExists​(java.lang.String apiID)
                                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Search if an ingredient is already present in the pantry before inserting it
        Parameters:
        apiID - The apiID return by edamam api
        Returns:
        A CachedRowSet, containing 1 to 0 elements, depending if the ingredient is already in the pantry or not
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • saveUserInfo

        public static void saveUserInfo​(java.lang.String username,
                                java.lang.String FirstName,
                                java.lang.String LastName,
                                java.lang.String userGender,
                                java.lang.Double Height,
                                java.lang.Double Weight,
                                java.lang.Boolean HealthyMode,
                                java.lang.String birthDate)
        Saves the user's info in the database
        Parameters:
        username - The name which will be displayed on the home page
        FirstName - User's first name
        LastName - User's last name
        userGender - User's gender
        Height - User's height
        Weight - User's weight
        HealthyMode - User's preference about seeing calories information or not
        birthDate - User's birth date

      • getUserProfile

        public static javax.sql.rowset.CachedRowSet getUserProfile()
                                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Used to get the usernames to populate the combobox
        Returns:
        A CachedRowSet containing all the usernames from the table User
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getUserInfo

        public static javax.sql.rowset.CachedRowSet getUserInfo​(java.lang.String username)
                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Used to get all the informations about a certain user
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user we want to get info
        Returns:
        The selected user's information
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • modifUserInfo

        public static void modifUserInfo​(java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String FirstName,
                                 java.lang.String LastName,
                                 java.lang.String userGender,
                                 java.lang.Double Height,
                                 java.lang.Double Weight,
                                 java.lang.Boolean HealthyMode,
                                 java.lang.String birthDate,
                                 java.lang.Integer userId)
        Used to update the informations about a certain user, referenced by his auto generated userID
        Parameters:
        username - The username to update
        FirstName - The first name to update
        LastName - The last name to update
        userGender - The gender to update
        Height - The height to update
        Weight - The weight to update
        HealthyMode - The healthy mode to update
        birthDate - The birht date to update
        userId - The userId identifying the user to update

      • updateLoadedState

        public static void updateLoadedState​(java.lang.Integer userId)
        Used to change the loaded user
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user to be loaded

      • loadUserWithLoadedState

        public static javax.sql.rowset.CachedRowSet loadUserWithLoadedState()
                                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is used to get the information of the loaded user (the one using the software)
        Returns:
        A CachedRowSet containing the info of the loaded user
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • loadUserWithLoadedStateForInitialize

        public static javax.sql.rowset.CachedRowSet loadUserWithLoadedStateForInitialize()
                                                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is used at the startup of the software to load the user
        Returns:
        A CachedRowSet containing the last loaded user info
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • storeLastViewedRecipe

        public static void storeLastViewedRecipe​(int id,
                                         int user,
                                         java.lang.String name)
        Stores the last recipe viewed by the loaded user on the page recipe
        Parameters:
        id - The recipe Id
        user - The loaded user id
        name - The name of the recipe to store

      • getLastViewedRecipes

        public static javax.sql.rowset.CachedRowSet getLastViewedRecipes​(int user)
                                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method returns the last 5 viewed recipes by a certain user
        Parameters:
        user - The user id you want to get the last viewed recipes
        Returns:
        A CachedRowSet containing the last 5 viewed recipes of a certain user
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getIngredientsClostoBeExpired

        public static javax.sql.rowset.CachedRowSet getIngredientsClostoBeExpired()
                                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is used to check if the ingredients in the pantry are close to their expiration date
        Returns:
        A CachedRowSet containing the information of the close to expire ingredients
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • addFavouriteRecipe

        public static void addFavouriteRecipe​(int idRecipe,
                                      int user,
                                      java.lang.String name)
        Stores a recipe in the favorites table to be seen later
        Parameters:
        idRecipe - The recipe id (given by spoonacular api) of the recipe to save
        user - The user id of the user that added this recipe to his favorites
        name - The name of the recipe to add to the favorites

      • deleteFavouriteRecipe

        public static void deleteFavouriteRecipe​(int idRecipe,
                                         int user)
        Deletes the selected favorite recipe
        Parameters:
        idRecipe - The id of the recipe to delete
        user - The user id associated with this favorite

      • deleteUser

        public static void deleteUser​(java.lang.String username)
        Deletes the selected user
        Parameters:
        username - The id of the user to delete

      • getFavouriteRecipe

        public static javax.sql.rowset.CachedRowSet getFavouriteRecipe​(int user)
                                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Used to get the favorite recipes of the loaded user
        Parameters:
        user - The user id of the loaded user
        Returns:
        A CachedRowSet containing the favorites recipes of a certain user
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
